h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: Be wary when he assumes a crouched stance with his swords up. He'll start walking forward while performing a series of twirling slashes, which can be tough to avoid as all six slashes come out very rapidly, so keep your distance or try to deflect them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
Be wary when he assumes a crouched stance with his swords up. He'll start walking forward while performing a series of twirling slashes, which can be tough to avoid as all six slashes come out very rapidly, so keep your distance or try to deflect them.
